data.name: No Levels Early
data.rules:
Beat the Game with these Goals: 
• No entering a lobby without opening it in K Lumsy
• No entering a level without removing the B. Locker
• Must defeat all bosses (defined as an enemy that spawns a key) and K. Rool

Restrictions and Clarifications:
• Wrong kong GB grabbing is ALLOWED
• Remote blueprint collecting is ALLOWED
• GB duping is BANNED

General DK64 Speedrun Rules:
http://www.speedrun.com/dk64/guide/c0xtz
